name: Freelancer VA
description: Manage your life as a freelancerThe life of a freelancer can quickly become overwhelming with all the different projects, tasks, meetings, invoices, subscriptions, and everything else that needs to be managed.You don't need more time you just need a better system to manage everything in your small business.This dashboard is ideal for freelancers and consultants who needs to manage their clients & meetings, while staying on top of their projects and never missing a deadline ever again.Include
features: CRM:Manage all of your clients and meetings; Project Management:Manage your client's projects & tasks; Finance Tracker:Track your income, expenses, subscriptions, and bank accounts; Invoices:Manage and create personalized invoices for your clients; Notebook:Simple note-taking system for your freelance work; Library:A place to keep all your resources, links, portfolio pages, etc.; Phone Notes:Take notes on your phone and have them sync to your dashboard; A.I. Assistant:100 Notion AI prompts for growing on social media, Twitter, and YouTube; Dashboard Walkthrough:Full video walkthrough included
